name: Through the Post
description:
Through the Post is an asynchronous, epistolary exchange where you and another person develop setting, character, and story through an exchange of letters between two persons: badger and rabbit. It is intended for actual paper, pen, and postage, but you can play the game through email if those supplies are difficult for you to obtain and internet access is more available.

This game was written as part of a Clawhammer Games game jam.
